system.description:
Effect: The Type, Power, Accuracy, and Range of this attack are modified by the Fling stats of the utilized item. When using Fling utilizing a Held creature, Fling's Power and Accuracy are as follows:

Power = 20 + (userLift / 4) + (thrownWC * 3)
Accuracy = 75 + (userLift / 5) + userCatMod - (4 * thrownCatMod)
Range = 8 + (userLift / 6) + userCatMod - (2* thrownCatMod)

actions.name: Fling
actions.description:
Effect: The Type, Power, Accuracy, and Range of this attack are modified by the Fling stats of the utilized item. When using Fling utilizing a Held creature, Fling's Power and Accuracy are as follows:

Accuracy = 75 + (userLift / 5) + userCatMod - (4 * thrownCatMod)
Range = 8 + (userLift / 6) + userCatMod - (2* thrownCatMod)
